creator: colesen@transdyn.com
text:
Try opening the URL. Batik launches a popup titled "ERROR" saying 
SVG Error: 
!!! getTotalLength() 
 
The following is the contents of the "Show Details" of the "ERROR" popup 
 
java.lang.RuntimeException:  !!! getTotalLength() 
	at org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SVGOMPathElement.getTotalLength(Unknown 
Source) 
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) 
	at 
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39) 
	at 
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25) 
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324) 
	at 
org.mozilla.javascript.NativeJavaMethod.call(NativeJavaMethod.java:230) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.call(ScriptRuntime.java:1191) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.gen.c14.call(Inline <script> 
http://www.carto.net/papers/svg/samples/progressive_drawing/krokus.svgz:5:46) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.call(ScriptRuntime.java:1191) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.gen.c13.call(Inline <script> 
http://www.carto.net/papers/svg/samples/progressive_drawing/krokus.svgz:5:13) 
	at 
org.mozilla.javascript.optimizer.OptRuntime.callSimple(OptRuntime.java:275) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.gen.c16.call(Event attribute 
http://www.carto.net/papers/svg/samples/progressive_drawing/krokus.svgz:4 
onload:1) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.gen.c16.exec(Event attribute 
http://www.carto.net/papers/svg/samples/progressive_drawing/krokus.svgz:4 
onload) 
	at org.mozilla.javascript.Context.evaluateReader(Context.java:820) 
	at org.apache.batik.script.rhino.RhinoInterpreter.evaluate(Unknown 
Source) 
	at 
org.apache.batik.bridge.BaseScriptingEnvironment$1.handleEvent(Unknown Source) 
	at org.apache.batik.dom.events.EventSupport.fireEventListeners(Unknown 
Source) 
	at org.apache.batik.dom.events.EventSupport.dispatchEvent(Unknown 
Source) 
	at org.apache.batik.dom.AbstractNode.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) 
	at 
org.apache.batik.bridge.BaseScriptingEnvironment.dispatchSVGLoad(Unknown 
Source) 
	at 
org.apache.batik.bridge.BaseScriptingEnvironment.dispatchSVGLoadEvent(Unknown 
Source) 
	at org.apache.batik.bridge.UpdateManager.dispatchSVGLoadEvent(Unknown 
Source) 
	at org.apache.batik.swing.svg.SVGLoadEventDispatcher.run(Unknown 
Source) 
 
The versions used are Batik 1.5.1, Java 1.4.2_04, Fedora Core 2 test 3, 
Konqueror 3.2.2. 
The Adobe svg viewer plugin (in KDE Konqueror) displays the svg and does not 
report any errors.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: This is because that particular DOM method has not been implemented yet.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Reassigning all open bugs to the development list.
Sorry for the mass mailing.
This is now implemented in CVS as of 2/26.
creator: deweese@apache.org
